extendedInfo.description: Are you tired like me to go back and forth to check the charts of your favorite stocks??? This application was made for you!This app allows you to quickly build a favorite list of stocks (watch list) and display many charts in one single page.You can then review these CHARTS quickly and SORT them in different ways ...Start by selecting one of the major list/index:- Dow Jones Industrial Average- Nasdaq 100- S&P 100- Favorites (your favorite list of stocks)- MorningStar Wide Moat Focus- China ADRs- Sector ETFsâââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââ  YOU CAN ALSO ADD YOUR OWN STOCKS => THIS IS HOW:Select "Favorites" > at the very bottom of the screen > Select "Add own stocks"ââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââ(Other lists you will find in the PRO version of this app:- New Highs- New Lows- Top Gainers- Top Losers- Overbought- Oversold- Unusual Volume- Broker Upgrades- Broker Downgrades- Earnings before market- Earnings after market- Insider buying- Insider selling- Channel Up/Down- Triangle Asc/Desc- Double Top/ Bottom- Multiple Top/Bottom- Head & Shoulders/Inverted- Wedge Up/Down- Trendline Support/Resistance/Hoizontal- Most Active- Major News- (Inverted) Hammer- (Dragonfly/Gravestone) Doji- Long Upper/Lower Shadow- Spinning Top White/Black- Marubozu White/Black- High Sales Growth QoQ- Earnings Today (before Market Open/ after Market Close)- EarningsTomorrow - Earnings Next 5 Days, This week, Next week, This month- Float Short > 20% (Large / Mid / Small / MicroCap )==> The app will display the charts of all the stocks within the choosen list in a few batches.Please choose in what order you want to see these stocks/charts:- Ticker - Company name- Gainers / Losers of the day- Market Cap- Volume- P/E- Beta- Money Flow- Last vs 52 weeks High- Last vs 52 weeks Low- After-hours/before-hours changeView the list of stocks in ascending (select âAscâ) or descending order (select âDescâ).Please choose how many stocks/charts you want to see per page/batch:1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 10 or 20.Finaly choose the timeframe of charts:- Daily- Weekly- MonthlyAnd the type of charts:- Candle charts- Line charts- Advanced charts (with trendlines and moving averages)Scroll down through the list of charts and at the bottom click on âNext 10 chartsâ to see the next batch of charts ...On any chart :- CLICK to zoom in a particular chart (pinch with your 2 fingers to zoom-in/out and scroll left and right) âââ LONG CLICK to add the stock to your favorite list  âââA stock that has been added to your favorite list of stocks is shown with a *STAR before its name.We hope that youâll enjoy this app and that it will save you time going through hundreds of charts...Regards,WaveStock.comCharts are coming from FINVIZ - Thank you so much Alex.Copyright Â© 2010 FINVIZ.com. All Rights Reserved.âââ It is still under development, so please rate it accordingly âââ Please take a few seconds to SHARE the app on Twitter, Facebook, Google+ or any preferred venue as more downloads = I'll spend more time to develop this app further!Thank You.keywords: charts, charts and graphs, stocks, stocks app, stocks widget, stocks yahoo, wallstreet, wallstreet survivor, wallstreetsurvivorâââ If the app force closes from time to time, please use less than 20 charts per page (we're investigating why it doesn't work well on some devices). Thank you for your understanding. ââââââ Mainly for US & Canadian listed stocks + international ADR âââ

reviews.comment: Good app. Will pay for a real time version.
reviews.author: Jimmy Teo

reviews.title: Real nice free market view app
reviews.comment: Next book 7\" tablet. Overall for a free app I\'d give this 4.5 stars. I plan to upgrade and pay for the pro version so I guess that says something positive about the free app. Would be great if user could select other chart periods other than 1 year, and could add my own chart lines for such things as cost basis and date lines (so I could enter my purchase date and watch my 3,6,12 month points). Also would be nice if a refresh button were there. I\'m not a day trader so gives me a great way to view my stocks
reviews.author: Cur Tis

reviews.title: Lots of info
reviews.comment: This app is very useful. Lots of data shown graphically. Would be even more useful if you could superimpose graphs of several companies for direct comparison. Also, would be useful if you could enter a stock dirctly for a quick look without having to enter \'favorites\' list.
reviews.author: Stephen Gottesman

reviews.title: needs shorter time / realtime indicators
reviews.comment: Great start to this app. A couple more additions like screen by price and 5 minute to 1 hour indicators  and it could be real useful
reviews.author: Doug Fanning

reviews.title: Futures add
reviews.comment: Would be nice to also have futures charts.
reviews.author: Carlos Plech

reviews.title: Almost good
reviews.comment: Great interface. I would buy the pro if i could choose the stock i want and change the technical indicators, otherwise it\'s useless. Will never use if that doesnt change.
reviews.author: A Google User
